description: Borrowed from Italian parmigiana, shortening of alla parmigiana (“in the Parmesan way”), or, as a noun, of parmigiana di melanzane/melanzane alla parmigiana, the southern Italian dish which is made with eggplant.

entries.meaning: (cooking) Cooked or served with Parmesan cheese and tomato sauce.
(in combination) Any dish in which a main ingredient is combined with cheese and coated with tomato sauce before being baked.
